title: Kerala Floods: Rescue operations underway in submerged areas of Alappuzha
description: WATCH: Boats are being used to rescue stranded residents in the Kuttanad region of Kerala following incessant rains.
author: India Today

title: Uttarakhand Landslide BREAKING: Badrinath highway blocked, hundreds of pilgrims stranded
description: A massive landslide triggered by heavy monsoon rains has blocked the primary route to the Badrinath shrine.
author: NDTV

title: Cyclone Alert for Andhra Pradesh coast, storm expected to make landfall tomorrow
description: The Indian Meteorological Department has issued a red alert for several coastal districts in Andhra Pradesh.
author: Times of India

title: Heatwave in Delhi breaks all-time records, temperatures soar past 50Â°C
description: An unprecedented heatwave has gripped the national capital, leading to severe water shortages and health warnings.
author: Hindustan Times

title: Assam Flood situation remains grim, over 5 lakh people affected
description: The Brahmaputra river continues to flow above the danger mark, inundating hundreds of villages across Assam.
author: The Hindu

title: Earthquake tremors felt in Jaipur, residents rush out of homes. Official confirmation awaited.
description: Rumors are spreading after mild tremors were reported in parts of Rajasthan. This video is being shared with the news.
author: Zee News
